questions.prompt: Give a valid propositional logic formula with the variables \(P, Q\)
\(XOR\) is defined by \(a XOR b = (a + b) \cdot -(a \cdot b)\). Give an equivalent formula to \(a XOR b\)
Let \(W\) = 'I am warm', \(S\) = 'it is sunny', \(I\) = 'I am inside'. Translate the following sentence into a propositional logic formula: 'If it is sunny or I am inside, then I am warm.'
